allspice.name: Allspice
allspice.description: Some basic spice, freshly harvested from a Spice Plant.

barnacle.name: Mortar Barnacle
barnacle.description: If clinging to things is a skill, this little fella was a champion. Once prised from a cluster (or "Blister") of pals, Barnacles can be introduced to the Grinder to find a new purpose.

bean.name: Bean
bean.description: A bean. It can be used for cooking, or it can be seasoned to turn it into seeds for different trees and plants.

cherry.name: Cherry
cherry.description: A basic cherry, freshly picked from a Fruit Tree.

chunk_beryl.name: Chunk of Beryl
chunk_beryl.description: Halfway between sparkly and dull, it's an innocuous chunk of beryl.

chunk_dullite.name: Chunk of Dullite
chunk_dullite.description: A hefty chunk of dullite. What it lacks in sparkliness it makes up for in, um, dullness.

chunk_metal.name: Chunk of Metal Rock
chunk_metal.description: Chunky and metally, this rock, when smelted, makes Plain Metal. Boring maybe, but it's an excellent base for more ambitious alchemical experimentation.

chunk_sparkly.name: Chunk of Sparkly
chunk_sparkly.description: It's a pleasantly twinkly chunk of sparkly!

earth.name: Lump of Earth
earth.description: Many have tried to sum up the wonder of Earth, with superlatives like "Earthy", "Lumpy" and "Eart... oh, that's been said? Brown, then." But it's just a lump of earth. For building with.

egg.name: Egg
egg.description: A plain, unseasoned egg, newly harvested from an Egg Plant. It can be used for all kinds of cooking, or it can be hatched into different animals.

fiber.name: Fiber
fiber.description: A patch of downy hair brushed from the tail of a fox, perfect for spinning into thread or stuffing into furniture for padding.  Also might be perfect for gluing to your face as a moustache, but due to its origin (the underside of a fox tail), no one does.

general_vapour.name: General Vapour
general_vapour.description: A flask of all-purpose general vapour, harvested from a Gas Plant.

guano.name: Guano
guano.description: An unobtrusive pellet from the back end of a Batterfly, Guano can be used as a fertilizer to boost the growth of Crops and Herbs, as an ingredient for Potions, or in the street-building trade.

ice.name: Ice
ice.description: A nugget of purest ice, plucked with a scraper from the Nubbins of the north and ripe in readiness for sno cones, cocktail making, and icing the occasional strained glitch-groin. Basically: frozen water in pleasingly cuboid form.

jellisac.name: Clump of Jellisac
jellisac.description: It's like your mother always said, just because it's slimy, doesn't mean it's not desirable. Even if she didn't say it, this stuff is certainly gloopy, and eminently usable. Where ooze is needed, jellisacs are your friend.

loam.name: Lump of Loam
loam.description: Ah, loam sweet loam. Moist and fertile, and leagues above plain old earth, this rich, meaty chunk of ground will do any building project proud.

peat.name: Block of Peat
peat.description: After eons of sitting in the bog -- condensing, compacting and quietly conducting Peaty business -- this dense stinky block should be used to boost building projects.

plain_bubble.name: Plain Bubble
plain_bubble.description: A common, ordinary, plain bubble harvested from  Bubble Tree.

plank.name: Plank
plank.description: A plain wooden plank with many uses.

salmon_bubble.name: Salmon Bubble
salmon_bubble.description: A bubble caught from the wake of an escaping Salmon.
